data.text: Na Naamani Sofar buaa sɛ,
“Ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔyi saa nsɛm yi ano anaa?
Wo nsɛm hunu no bɛma nnipa ayɛ komm anaa?
Woka kyerɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ, ‘Me gyidie ho nni asɛm
Ao, anka mepɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn kasa,
na ɔmmue nyansa mu ahintasɛm so nkyerɛ wo,
“Wobɛtumi ate Onyankopɔn anwanwadeɛ ase anaa?
Ɛkorɔn sene ɔsoro, ɛdeɛn na wobɛtumi ayɛ?
Ne nsusuiɛ mu ware sene asase
“Sɛ ɔba na ɔde wo to nneduadan mu
Ampa ara ɔhyɛ nnipa nnaadaafoɔ nso;
Nanso ogyimifoɔ rentumi nyɛ onyansafoɔ
“Na sɛ wode wʼakoma ma no
sɛ wogyaa bɔne a wokura no mu
ɛnneɛ, wobɛpagya wo ti a womfɛre;
Wo werɛ bɛfiri wʼahokyere,
Wʼabrabɔ bɛhyerɛn asene owigyinaeɛ,
Wobɛnya banbɔ, ɛfiri sɛ anidasoɔ wɔ hɔ;
Wobɛda ahome, na obi renhunahuna wo,
Amumuyɛfoɔ ani bɛfira,
